items.title: Why is Ukraine negotiating a minerals deal with the US?
items.description: A minister says nearly all key details have been finalised for a deal giving the US access to the country's minerals.

items.title: Macron to warn Trump against looking weak to Putin
items.description: The French president is at the White House to appeal to Trump against rushing into a deal with Russia.

items.title: US star John Legend defends playing  Rwanda concert during war
items.description: 'We shouldn't punish people when we disagree with their leaders', he told the BBC.

items.title: Sudan army ends two-year siege of key city
items.description: The Sudan army captures el-Obeid hours after rival RSF forces signed a charter for a breakaway government.

items.title: Pope critical but 'in good humour' in hospital
items.description: The pontiff is in good humour and eating normally though he remains "critical", Vatican sources say.
